verses.name: Jeremiah 42:6
verses.text: Whether it be good, or whether it be evil, we will obey the voice of the Lord our God, to whom we send thee; that it may be well with us, when we obey the voice of the Lord our God.

verses.name: Jeremiah 42:7
verses.text: And it came to pass after ten days, that the word of the Lord came unto Jeremiah.

verses.name: Jeremiah 42:8
verses.text: Then called he Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces which were with him, and all the people from the least even to the greatest,
